name: Unnatural Selection (itch)
description:
Mutations are the driving force behind evolution by natural selection. Random alterations in DNA thrown into nature to see what sticks.

That’s how it was.
Today, we do the selecting. Or, you do.

As the world’s problems escalate, desperate governments have turned to your company for a solution.

But there may be side effects.

Made by: Mads Sønderstrup, Marie-Louise Alexius Sørensen, Christoffer Krakou, Rares Popa, Alexandru Busnita, Lorena Ciobanu, Dom Ford and Mathies Wiencke.
